module.caption: QTouch Library for AVR UC3 L0
module.info: This is the QTouch Library for ARV UC3 L0 devices that consists in one api header file(touch_api_at32uc3l.h) and one pre-compiled library(libuc3l-qtouch-gnu.a). All projects using this library must also provide the required header file(touch_config_at32uc3l.h) used to configure the library. For more information on the Qtouch Library, check www.atmel.com/qtouchlib.
